definition[0]: the sweet liquid that bees collect from flowers
definition[1]: thick juice made from particular fruit
definition[2]: the drink of the gods, in the stories of ancient Greece
definition[3]: a system run by Sainsbury's, BP, and several other British shops, in which you earn points when you spend money in those shops and show that you have a Nectar card. The points allow you to have free meals, free entry into amusement parks, free plane tickets etc, and the more points you have, the more valuable the free things you are allowed to have.
